title: Hide Creator message in rooms without media

requirements.text: Modify the room card display logic to only show the Creator message for rooms that were created with media (image, video, or X post). Rooms created without any media should not display the Creator message at all.

quotes: can we make it so rooms without media dont display the Creator message at all
only show the creator message with rooms that were created with media

acceptanceCriteria: Rooms created with images display the Creator message
Rooms created with videos display the Creator message
Rooms created with X posts display the Creator message
Rooms created without any media do not display the Creator message

nonGoals: Changing the Creator message content or styling
Modifying how media is uploaded or stored
Altering the backend data model for rooms
